title: Jennifer Balakrishnan
summary: Jennifer Shyamala Sayaka Balakrishnan is an American mathematician[1] known for leading a team that solved the problem of the "cursed curve", a Diophantine equation that was known for being "famously difficult".[2] More generally, Balakrishnan specializes in algorithmic number theory and arithmetic geometry. She is the Clare Boothe Luce Associate Professor at Boston University.[1][3]
